name: 許哲奇
objective: This module draws on the concurrent course in Heat, Mass and Momentum Transfer, which gives the necessary foundations. The aim of this module is to deepen the students knowledge of the unit operations with a focus on distillation, absorption, adsorption and drying processes. This provides a foundation for the Chemical Engineering. The present lectures will extend the Momentum Transfer to Heat and Mass Transfer. We will explore efficient short cut methods and briefly introduce the principles behind.
schedule:
1-4 weeks: Heat transfer by conduction
5-6 weeks: Heat Flow in Fluids
7-8 weeks: Heat Transfer to Fluid
9 week: Midterm Exam 
10-12 weeks: Radiation Heat Transfer
12-14 weeks: Heat Exchanger
15-16 weeks: Mass Transfer
17 week: Final Exam
18 week: Discussion
scorePolicy:
Homework and Quizzes 30%
Midterm exam 40% 
Final Exam 45%
materials:
" Unit Operations of Chemical Engineering" 7th edition  
Author: McCabe,Smith and Harriott
remarks: If we encounter the threat of COVID, the alternative is distance learning via MS teams.
